name: RES_MICRO_WORKUP_V
description: This table contains data for microbiology workup results.

columns.name: RESULT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the result record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values that are associated with the line from the RES_MICRO_WORKUP table.

columns.name: WORKUP_VALUE
columns.description: Component values for each line and workup.
